metadata.title: CVE-2019-5786 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Object lifetime issue in Blink in Google Chrome prior to 72.0.3626.121allowed a remote attacker to potentially perform out of bounds memoryaccess via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
